article_title: Hospital Profits Soar As Obamacare Prescribes More Paying Patients

article_metadata.description: Hospital operators continue to see profits and revenue not seen in a decade thanks to the Affordable Care Act and related efforts to sign up uninsured patients to coverage so facilities can reduce unpaid medical bills. Large hospital operators HCA Holdings (HCA), Tenet Healthcare (THC) and Community Health Systems (CYH) in [...]
